cover: OUR DRIVES SOLIDARY AND DEMOCRATIC ACTIVISM IN BRAZIL

header.title: Join us
header.description: NOSSAS supports individuals, collectives and organizations in their struggle for rights and better public policies. We share opportunities for action, methodologies and tools for creating impact mobilizations. Explore our activism space and boost your movement with us!

join-us.title: Join one of our campaigns
join-us.about: Find out about the causes in which we are currently engaged and participate in our fight for the defense of rights and strengthening of democracy.

materials.title: Access our educational materials
materials.about: We offer a super complete material and with several tips to help your collective or organization to increase its impact.

trainings.title: Be trained in activism methodologies
trainings.about: Throughout the year, we carry out free and themed activism training programs for people from all over Brazil. See which classes are open now.

incubations.title: Incubate your project with us
incubations.about: Receive training, support and mentoring through the incubation program. We accelerate mobilization and solidarity projects that want to impact the world.

technologies.title: Use the best activism technologies
technologies.about: Discover BONDE, our technology platform, specially developed for amateur or experienced activists to create their campaigns tailored to your needs.

1.title: Libera o tablet
1.description: The São Paulo government purchased tablets for public school students last year, but so far it has not released the equipment to assist in the remote education of young people!

2.title: Metrô, Aumento Não!
2.description: The Rio de Janeiro subway ticket can increase to R $ 6.30. Meu Rio is fighting this cowardice with the pocket of the worker, who already pays dearly for a bad service.

3.title: Auxílio até o fim da pandemia
3.description: The end of emergency aid in 2021 could leave thousands of people destitute. The distribution of resources must continue as long as the crisis lasts!

4.title: Tem gente com fome
4.description: A national mobilization is raising funds to fight hunger and misery in the pandemic. You have to buy food, hunger cannot wait!

sustainability.description: NOSSAS lives on donations from people and foundations that believe in our work. We do not receive money from utilities, private companies or political parties, and we audit our accounts annually with independent professionals. Contribute yourself too!
